info.text: [boolean]Seems like we have one more wall to break through, want to pick up where we left off?
The muscular system and the skeletal system depend on each other for movement. The skeletal muscles from the muscular system attach themselves to the bones
which allows the body to support itself. When the muscles contract, the muscles pull the bones in certain directions and allow the whole body to move.
Oh, it seems as if he's done mining.
